html:
9.12.18  2:30 am   When you go on tour and you are working on music and videos will you be able to take your door knob with you

     i don't know how that would be possible but i never thought what i'm doing now would be possible before

9.12.18  1:30 am   are you divinely inspired

     maybe more

9.11.18  11:39 pm   how do you determine the length of your titles?

     could count the letters i suppose

9.11.18  10:39 pm   Are you writing new songs for the more stern 2-week schedule to give yourself some time to get comfy before you start completing older song fragments again, so that you're doing the proper justice you envision for such song fragments?

     no

9.11.18  9:05 pm   I know you don't monetize your videos so why did you censer out fuck in ''I'm best friends with my own front door''

     if i censored it then how did you know it was there

9.11.18  8:03 pm   hey is life cool?

     maybe more

9.11.18  7:20 pm   How do you do that thing where you make a song sound really silly, but by the end of the song I'm thinking deeply about my life and the universe and space and time?

     oh that's the oldest trick in the book

9.11.18  6:02 pm   I failed a geometry test and I don't ever want to return to school. Help

     you could try wearing a disguise

9.11.18  5:55 pm   why do cough drops taste good? please answer this is the most important question any human has asked

     that's not true but i don't know what they taste like

9.11.18  4:26 pm   Can you give me a "Bill Wurtz guide to making a DIY Halloween costume"?

     i can never remember when halloween is

9.11.18  3:24 pm   If santa isn't real, can I make my own Christmas guy?

     sure

9.11.18  2:34 pm   How do you write songs?

     sometimes i let them write me

9.11.18  1:27 pm   Why did you spell questions wrong?

     i did not but why did you ignore the color scheme

9.11.18  12:48 pm   le epic face reveal when !! 

     never

9.11.18  11:59 am   Is there some deeper meaning than high meaning behind your songs?

     low?

9.11.18  11:35 am   When will you win another award (ex. Shorty Award for Best in Weird)

     when i feel like it

9.11.18  11:29 am   you've been really helpful to me! thank you so much! how do you feel about positive, wholesome people?

     everyone is positive and wholesome, and more

9.11.18  9:38 am   what should i put in my bagel for lunch

     how about some bread

9.11.18  8:53 am   is sexy pants referring to a person or an article of clothing?

     sure

9.11.18  8:25 am   I was wondering: How to feel?

     good and bad

9.11.18  7:58 am   I proposed the idea of using your "Hallelujah" song as our new gospel acclamation to my local Catholic church's head priest. He didn't seem too enthralled by the idea. Why do you think that may be?

     maybe he doesn't like it

9.11.18  2:08 am   Do you ever worry about repeating yourself in your lyrics or melodies? How do you work on that?

     get crazier

9.11.18  1:08 am   do you ever have a hard time getting/staying asleep? the timestamps on your answers to these questions make it look like you don't ever sleep for more than an hour or two at a time and that seems like it might be unpleasant

     the time stamp is when the question was asked

9.11.18  12:31 am   what provides you with creative inspiration?

     everything

9.11.18  12:06 am   do u have any tips for proper form/technique in playing piano 

     put the chair at the right height so your wrists aren't bent up or down, just so you don't hurt yourself

9.10.18  10:33 pm   Is reality really real?

     let me perform some calculations

9.10.18  10:28 pm   Opinions on spaghetti

     it is linear

9.10.18  10:28 pm   how do you ask someone out on a date 

     no need to ask. if it's right you will already be on a date

9.10.18  10:22 pm   Do you believe in thanksgiving or just go straight into Christmas vibes

     it gradually gets colder and darker

9.10.18  9:54 pm   how come you're choosing to create new songs instead of picking ones already created to work on, considering writing a whole new song is going to take longer than one that was already created/started? i think you've been asked this before, but i can't recall what your response was so i apologize if this seems repetitive

     i always select old songs. i've done that almost every time. when am i ever gonna get a chance to write something new? the answer is now

9.10.18  9:36 pm   optimism or pessimism?

     that seems neutral

9.10.18  8:46 pm   instead of frying chicken how about we just rocket launch them to the sun for extra crispness.

     difficult to retrieve them

9.10.18  7:46 pm   Can you exist out of time?, because thats the only way you could think up all your ideas. (and not mention create them)

     if i could pause time i could make so much more

9.10.18  7:10 pm   When are you going on tour? 

     right away

9.10.18  6:49 pm   What do you think of the Butterfly Effect?

     butterfly is necessary for the effect. if you don't have a butterfly, do not even think about attempting to do the effect

9.10.18  6:41 pm   how is weather?

     interesting

9.10.18  6:40 pm   is the world beautiful?

     yes, and more

9.10.18  6:37 pm   do you walk or run through the rain?

     i have had an opportunity to do both

9.10.18  6:16 pm   would you say that you are a fan of biscuits?

     i keep forgetting which is which

9.10.18  5:24 pm   Is your room acoustically treated? 

     somewhat

9.10.18  4:58 pm   bill, what is the first letter of your next song, please?

     m

9.10.18  4:55 pm   i tried to become best friends with my own front door, but he said that we can't be friends until i eat a croissant while wearing a purple unitard.  did you have to go through this same process?

     no

     should i do it?

     no

9.10.18  3:46 pm   tempo of new song?

     83

9.10.18  3:05 pm   how do i get that nice magical sound in my music

     do what you feel like doing

9.10.18  2:44 pm   why is there a 'i'm feeling randy' button

     to give you the opportunity to read randomly selected questions from the questions archives

9.10.18  2:36 pm   man homework sucks. how do i not hate homework?

     make up your own

9.10.18  2:26 pm   can you recommend me a good book?

     the big book of ways you can fuck up, by tonsil fulbrick

9.10.18  2:09 pm   what kind of music do you make

     you'll have to listen and see

9.10.18  2:06 pm   what questions do you dislike the most

     the ones about dislikes

9.10.18  2:05 pm   what's your lucky number

     all numbers are lucky
